name: Auto-generate Crichd Files

on:
  schedule:
    - cron: "*/30 * * * *"
  workflow_dispatch:

permissions:
  contents: write

jobs:
  build:
    runs-on: ubuntu-latest

    steps:
      - name: Checkout Repo
        uses: actions/checkout@v4
        with:
          persist-credentials: true

      - name: Set up Python
        uses: actions/setup-python@v4
        with:
          python-version: "3.11"

      - name: Install dependencies
        run: |
          python -m pip install --upgrade pip
          pip install -r requirements.txt || true
          pip install requests pyzipper==0.3.6 playwright
          playwright install chromium

      - name: Extract protected app.zip
        env:
          ZIP_PWD: ${{ secrets.ZIP_PWD }}
        run: |
          python run.py

      - name: Run app.py
        run: |
          python app.py

      - name: Commit and push changes
        env:
          GITHUB_TOKEN: ${{ secrets.GITHUB_TOKEN }}
        run: |
          git config --global user.name "GitHub Actions Bot"
          git config --global user.email "actions@github.com"
          git add playlist.json playlist.m3u || true
          git commit -m "Auto update All Data $(date -u +'%Y-%m-%d %H:%M:%S')" || echo "No changes to commit"
          git push origin HEAD:main
